response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Maximum Sum of Subarray\", \"description\": \"Given a list of integers, find the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray within it.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray within the input list.\\n\", \"code\": \"\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n    max_sum = float('-inf')\\n    current_sum = 0\\n    for num in arr:\\n        current_sum = max(num, current_sum + num)\\n        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)\\n    return max_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_subarray([-2,1,-3,4,-1,2,1,-5,4]) == 6\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([1,2,3,4,5]) == 15\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([-1,-2,-3,-4,-5]) == -1\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([]) == 0\"] }"
